name: Heat & Yeet
description:
Heat & Yeet is a two-player coop game where players manage a food truck by completing orders within a time limit. Each player is responsible for each section of the truck, driving and cooking.

Credits

Lead Game Designer | Mark Laguitan

Project Management | Ali Al Dakhil, Timur Morozkov

Game Design | Sergiusz Stein, Kristoffer Holma, Devrim Kara, Klaudia Bartkow

Programming | Alexander Wahrenstedt, Alexander Schöllin, Teddy Molin, Hugo Axelsson

Art | Amanda Hahne, Teddy Stenqvist

Quality Assurance | Douglas Emtemark, Albin Rüemenap
